alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Oneida (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 3:50PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL LINCOLN AND SOUTHWESTERN ONEIDA COUNTIES THROUGH 415 PM CDT... At 350 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Willow Lake, or 22 miles southeast of Park Falls, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Willow Lake around 355 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Mccord and Gobler Lake Natural Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
